topic.title: Salmonellosis PHCR Social History Section - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL conform to PHCR Phcr Social History Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.2.22)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] entry, such that
Contains @typeCode="DRIV" DRIV (is derived from)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Salmonellosis Possible Exposure Location And Type Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.115)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entry, such that
Contains @typeCode="DRIV" DRIV (is derived from)
Contains exactly one [1..1] HIV Status Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.4)
SHALL conform to CCD Social History Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.15)
SHALL conform to PHCR Phcr Social History Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.2.22)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="29762-2" Social History (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1894)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title = "Social History" (CONF:1895)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:1896)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] entry, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Social History Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.33)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:1897, CONF:1898, CONF:1899), such that
Contains @typeCode="DRIV" DRIV (is derived from)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Geotemporal History Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.3)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entry (CONF:1900, CONF:1901, CONF:1902), such that
Contains @typeCode="DRIV" DRIV (is derived from)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Most Recent Time Arrived In USA Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.6)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:1903, CONF:1904, CONF:1905), such that
Contains @typeCode="DRIV" DRIV (is derived from)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Race Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.9)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:1906, CONF:1907, CONF:1908), such that
Contains @typeCode="DRIV" DRIV (is derived from)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Occupation Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.7)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:1909, CONF:1910, CONF:1911), such that
Contains @typeCode="DRIV" DRIV (is derived from)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Pregnancy Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.8)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] entry, such that
Contains @typeCode="DRIV" DRIV (is derived from)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Salmonellosis Possible Exposure Location And Type Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.115)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entry, such that
Contains @typeCode="DRIV" DRIV (is derived from)
Contains exactly one [1..1] HIV Status Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.4)

SHOULD satisfy: Contains a case-insensitive language-insensitive string containing 'social history'. (CONF-236)
UNIMPLEMENTABLE

Marital status SHOULD be represented as ClinicalDocument / recordTarget / patientRole / patient / maritalStatusCode. Additional information MAY be represented as social history observations (CONF-250)
[OCL]: self.getClinicalDocument().recordTarget->select(r | not r.patientRole.patient.maritalStatusCode.hasContent() )->isEmpty()

Religious affiliation SHOULD be represented as ClinicalDocument / recordTarget / patientRole / patient / religiousAffiliationCode. Additional information MAY be represented as social history observations (CONF-251)
[OCL]: self.getClinicalDocument().recordTarget->select(r | not r.patientRole.patient.religiousAffiliationCode.hasContent() )->isEmpty()

A patients race SHOULD be represented as ClinicalDocument / recordTarget / patientRole / patient / raceCode. Additional information MAY be represented as social history observations (CONF-252)
[OCL]: self.getClinicalDocument().recordTarget->select(r | not r.patientRole.patient.raceCode.hasContent() )->isEmpty()

The value for ClinicalDocument / recordTarget / patientRole / patient / raceCode MAY be selected from codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.5.104 (Race) (CONF-253)
[OCL]: self.getClinicalDocument().recordTarget->forAll(r | r.patientRole.patient.raceCode.codeSystem = '2.16.840.1.113883.5.104' )

A patients ethnicity SHOULD be represented as ClinicalDocument / recordTarget / patientRole / patient / ethnicGroupCode. Additional information MAY be represented as social history observations. (CONF-254)
[OCL]: self.getClinicalDocument().recordTarget->select(r | not r.patientRole.patient.ethnicGroupCode.hasContent() )->isEmpty()

The value for ClinicalDocument / recordTarget / patientRole / patient / ethnicGroupCode MAY be selected from codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.5.50 (Ethnicity). (CONF-255)
[OCL]: self.getClinicalDocument().recordTarget->forAll(r | r.patientRole.patient.ethnicGroupCode.codeSystem = '2.16.840.1.113883.5.50' )
